basic.description: This laboratory is a continuation of ENT 2010L, focusing on growing and running the micro-business throughout the academic year with planned liquidation and shutdown (Harvesting) at the end of the academic year.
basic.subject: ENT
basic.title: Managing and Harvesting New Ventures Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Admission to the major, ACG 2021, ENT 2010, and ENT 2010L. Corequisites: ACG 2071 and ENT 2011L.
